name: Longtail
tagline: A service that allows you to receive a never ending tail of irc logs
body:
### Instructions for using the longtail service.

- Send a mail to test@superuser.co.za to register
- A confirmation mail will be sent back to you with a passcode
- Send a mail to test@superuser.co.za with your passcode as subject to receive a log of all chats since your last email.
- Thats all (hopefully its simple enough)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
